message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early!
You're being too greedy, let's meet in the middle!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more. Consider this offer!
Let's be fair, 50/50 is a good starting point, but I'll give you a bit less to get you to accept.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I think I deserve a larger share. Don't let me walk away with all the cash!
You're getting greedy, but I'll give you a slightly better deal to keep the game going.
I'm running out of patience, Bob! This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me, I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
This is my last serious offer. I'm taking a risk, but I think I deserve a bigger share. Take it or leave it!
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting the better end of this deal!
This is my last offer. I'm taking a huge risk, but I think I deserve the majority of the remaining value. Take it or leave it!
It's all or nothing now. I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking the rest. It's time to end this game!
